title: Wait a second.
body:
So Bruiser Yi was a problem because Rageblade+Sated can provide insane damage with only 2 items.

*Riot finally tries to fix this after a couple of months.

**Now you only need 1 item to get Rageblade and sated  effect!**

wait what?
You know when I say designers are ruining this game intentionally,  that's more like a joke and I didn't mean it. But things are getting suspicious...
